<size=45>Chapter 5 - Surcouf in the Afternoon Pt. 1</size>

scripts.say: Port - Commander's Office
*Yaaaaaaawn*...

options.content: Give in to the urge to yawn

scripts.say: Now with my belly full of food, I say it's time for a nap.
Was that a yawn just now? You wanna take a nap, too?
You've been working nonstop since morning. You've gotta rest a while, or else you'll have no energy for your work in the afternoon.

options.content: You're just gonna fall asleep too...

scripts.say: So, you get some sleep, and I'll wake you once naptime is over!
Worrying about it won't do me any good. I should just take a short nap like she says.
I can hear somebody's voice...
Geez... "Take a nap," I say, and you switch off like a lightbulb.
Can't blame you for being so exhausted though, considering how busy you are with work. You deserve some rest, Commander.
Surcouf gently patted me on the head.
I've never watched over you like this before, come to think of it. Heheh, I can stare at you as much as I want~
Hmm... I guess you're...
... surprisingly... plain? I'm much cuter, and Jean Bart is way cooler.
Even so... you know how to amuse me, you never do anything to annoy me, and you know just what I like...
You're supervising such a big fleet, but you still care about all the little details...
I doubt my life would be the same without you at this point...
I'm picking up a rosy smell. What could it be?
... you very much, Commander.
It feels like Surcouf just said something important, but I can't ward off my drowsiness any longer...
